mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member(userId, userPass, userName) values(#{userId}, #{userPass}, #{userName})
mapper.select: select userId from tbl_member where userId = #{userId}
select userName from tbl_member where userName = #{userName}
select userId, userName, userPass from tbl_member where userId = #{userId} and userPass = #{userPass}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_member where userId = #{userId} and userPass = #{userPass}
